channel.title: Run.bat wont work!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im using this script in my run.bat
[code]@echo off title ScapeScape java -cp . server pause[/code]
But it comes up with an error? It's never done this before! Ive checked my inviromental settings and there perfect, could you give me a run script for this java version please;
[code]jdk1.6.0_07[/code]
Ty for your time,
Johno

item.title: Run.bat wont work!
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Can you use classpath with run.bat =S

Did you edit that file in any way? Most run’s arent like that.

Read full topic
